Posts.Content: grand08 wrote: I recently had a right duct excision due to bloody nipple discharge.  I received pathology results today which revealed intraductal papillomotosis- atypica. Surgeon said everything is good and nothing to worry about. I go abck in 3  months for another follow up with a mammo in 4 months.  Should I still be concerned?  I did reasearch and the papillomotis has increase risk for cancer. Should I geta second opinion? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: need opinions.. not diagnosis but worried grand08 Janet456
